Power Generation.Description: Power generation can rely on renewable energy sources such as solar, wind, hydro, and geothermal to reduce carbon emissions and promote sustainability.
Power generation needs a well-developed electricity grid to efficiently distribute electricity generated from various sources to consumers.
Power generation can benefit from energy storage technologies to store excess electricity generated during low demand periods and release it during high demand periods.

Power generation processes, particularly those relying on fossil fuels, can contribute to carbon emissions and climate change. Efforts are being made to reduce these emissions through cleaner power generation technologies.
